mapper.select: select count(1) from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL where HEAD_ID = #{headId} and PLAN_DT = #{planDtWid}
mapper.update: --对于最近5天 状态为执行中 如果在明细表中不存在未推送的记录，则将其状态更新为完成 UPDATE UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN T SET T.PLAN_STATUS='3' WHERE T.PLAN_DATE_WID>=TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5,'yyyymmdd')) AND T.PLAN_STATUS='2' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT FROM uo_op_activity_detail AP1 WHERE AP1.HEAD_ID=T.HEAD_ID AND AP1.PLAN_DT=T.PLAN_DATE_WID AND AP1.IS_PUSH='0')

UPDATE uo_op_activity_header T SET T.PREHEAT_STATUS = 'done' where t.preheat_status = 'doing' and t.has_preheat='1' and trunc(sysdate) >t.preheat_end_dt --至少有一条状态为执行完成 或停止 and exists ( select p.head_id from uo_op_activity_plan p where p.head_id=t.head_id and p.plan_status in('3','4') and p.activity_stage='preheat' )

UPDATE uo_op_activity_header T SET T.FORMAL_STATUS = 'done' where t.FORMAL_STATUS = 'doing' and t.has_preheat='0' and trunc(sysdate) >t.Formal_End_Dt --至少有一条状态为执行完成 或停止 and exists ( select p.head_id from uo_op_activity_plan p where p.head_id=t.head_id and p.plan_status in('3','4') and p.activity_stage='formal' )
